title: How to reshape a blob_out or tensor in Caffe2 with python API?
body_html:
Dear authors:
I am a newer in Caffe2 framework, So I want to know How to reshape a blob_out or tensor in Caffe2 with python API?
For example, like a numpy ndarray A with shape [16, 24, 28, 28], I want to reshape it to B with shape
[16, 3, 8, 28, 28], I have found some information in Caffe2 Official Wed. Although I can solve it with Net.Python() interface, it is tedious. Are there any easy solutions? And I am familiar with detectron framework. Thanks a lot.

body:
Dear authors:
  I am a newer in Caffe2 framework, So I want to know How to reshape a blob_out or tensor in Caffe2 with python API? 
  For example, like a numpy ndarray A with shape [16, 24, 28, 28], I want to reshape it to B with shape 
[16, 3, 8, 28, 28], I have found some information in Caffe2 Official Wed. Although I can solve it with Net.Python() interface, it is tedious. Are there any easy solutions? And I am familiar with detectron framework. Thanks a lot.
